$interpreted: Tica: Ughhhhhhh, another errand mission to a faraway place... But Tica's stamina is seriously running low...
Annie: The material harvest spot headmaster mentioned is located deep within Whistlewood Valley. Isn't that dangerous?
Tica: Headmaster has already contacted a guide, so it should be fine. It's just...

Elio: ... What if... I go in place of you this time?
Of course, this is under the premise that you keep it a secret from headmaster Ceres!
Tica: Eh, for real?
Tica: Ya-hoooo! Thanks a lot, Elio~

Elio: Not at all.
I want to help out the headmaster from time to time as well.
Annie: This is great!
Betty: I originally thought this is going to be a tough mission!
Cara: Now, with Elio accompanying us, I don't mind walking for a couple more days!
Elio: We're supposed to meet up with the guide right ahead. Let's get moving.
Cara: Elio, why do you always refer to headmaster Ceres as... well, headmaster?

Elio: ... We are doing a job request from the Academy.
I want to separate my work from my private life, that's why I referred to him that way.
Annie: Elio, there's a rumor that's been spreading across the whole Academy. It says that you're the child of a Kingdom of the Sun noble. Is that true?
Betty: I don't believe that crap at all.

Betty: All kingdom nobles have a strand of hair that glows. 
Take a look, you don't see that on Elio!
Elio: We've arrived at the scheduled location. Let's wait here.
Cara: Elio... are you angry?

Betty: We didn't mean to offend you... It's just that you're always so focused on your own things in the Academy. You never talk about yourself.
We're just curious about you. That's why we...
Annie: Sorry...
Elio: Forget it. To be fair, I also...
？？？: Look out!
Fatima: It has been a while, you three little brats.
Cara: Ehhh... So you're the guide!
Annie: Oh god. I bet that the headmaster did this on purpose...

Fatima: Don't be scared. If you're worried about the previous incident, Panthers have forgiven you guys a long time ago.
I promise I won't purposely lead you girls to be eaten by beasts~
Betty: The fact that you deliberately said that is what makes it even scarier...

Elio: Greetings. I'm Elio.
I'm here to carry out this mission in place of Miss Tica.
Fatima: That cheeky red-haired girl is not coming today!?
Fatima: Even though she's a bit ditzy, she is at least capable as a sorcerer. That's why Charle trusted her...
Fatima: Is it really Charle's decision to let you come?

Fatima: That face... I'll be frank.
I won't be able to trust someone who's not chosen by Charle himself!
Annie: Hey, that's enough!

Betty: Elio is headmaster Ceres's own son!
In terms of power, he's on equal footing with Tica too!
Cara: We can guarantee his ability. You still got a problem?

Fatima: Charle has a son!?
How come he never mentioned your existence?
